ygData.subject: Re: PvP Bard
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, I cannot speak from personal experience, but have some old friends who play on the PvP server, and one is a level 38 bard.  He told me that he is
ygData.messageBody:
Ok, I cannot speak from personal experience, but have some old friends who
play on the PvP server, and one is a level 38 bard. He told me that he is
"untouchable." Shrugged to myself, any PK will tell you they are "elite" or
some such thing, right? Another old friend finally bought EQ and then got
to see the PK Bard in action (killing people), and said he was so impressed
he almost deleted his (by that point) level 14 paladin. There aren't many
bards, but apparently at higher levels they come into their own and are
fairly formidable PKs.

Roop


>From: dean_witcraft@...
>
there PKing over and over again without so much as a nod to rp'ing so I gave
that up for the time being. Is anyone playing a PvP bard. Is this
experience typical?
>Any suggestions on how to stay alive?
